description:
The mysterious man, who claims to know Piodon, is terrified of Seth`s out-of-control form and ends up being blown out of the castle. When Seth disappears, Melie, Doc, and Ocoho follow traces of Fantasia to find him, but they end up in a forest that no one has ever escaped after entering. As they make their way through the forest, they find Myr and his wife Jill, who have been protecting Seth. He has become lost within the realm of consciousness, called Sidh, and refuses to leave because he`s afraid of his own power...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Seth in the Forest of Time: Caillte
Seth, dans la forêt du temps: Caillte
Toki no Mori no Seto: Caillte
